com.michaelRunzler.ARK.android.util.HelpOverlay

Class HelpOverlayScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.michaelRunzler.ARK.android.util.HelpOverlay.HelpOverlayScene

  • public class HelpOverlayScene
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores configuration data for individual 'scenes' in the DynamicHelpInterface. All fields are read-only, and cannot be changed after initialization. Container-type object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HelpOverlayScene(java.lang.String label, float x, float y, int width, int height, int maxLabelWidth, int labelBGColorID)
      Initializes a new scene object with the specified coordinates and dimensions.
      HelpOverlayScene(java.lang.String label, android.view.View target, int maxLabelWidth, int labelBGColorID)
      Initializes a new scene object with the specified target View.

      This value is true if the object was initialized using the view-based constructor, false if it was initialized using the coordinate-based constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HelpOverlayScene

        public HelpOverlayScene(@NonNull
                        java.lang.String label,
                        float x,
                        float y,
                        int width,
                        int height,
                        int maxLabelWidth,
                        int labelBGColorID)
        Initializes a new scene object with the specified coordinates and dimensions.
        Parameters:
        label - the text for the scene label
        x - the absolute X-coordinate in pixels. Must be >=0 and <= maximum screen width.
        y - the absolute Y-coordinate in pixels. Must be >=0 and <= maximum screen height.
        width - the width of the display field for the scene. Must be >= 0.
        height - the height of the display field for the scene. Must be >= 0.
        labelBGColorID - the color ID to use as the label background color. Set to -1 to use default.

      • HelpOverlayScene

        public HelpOverlayScene(@NonNull
                        java.lang.String label,
                        @NonNull
                        android.view.View target,
                        int maxLabelWidth,
                        int labelBGColorID)
        Initializes a new scene object with the specified target View.
        Parameters:
        label - the text for the scene label
        target - the View object to be used as the source for display field dimensions and coordinates
        maxLabelWidth - the maximum horizontal width of the label before wrapping around to another line
        labelBGColorID - the color ID to use as the label background color. Set to -1 to use default.
